Player History
Drafted in 32nd round, 505th overall pick, by St. Louis (B) in 2015...
Injured on 6/13/2015 with a Ruptured Tricep Tendon, out for 10 weeks...
Injured on 7/12/2016 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Injured on 8/25/2016 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 5/16/2017 with a Tight Shoulder, out for one week...
Traded from St. Louis (B) to Colorado on 7/31/2017 (Going to COL: P Buck Gleason. Going to SLB: CF Stephen Araiza)...
Injured on 8/5/2017 with a Torn Back Muscle, out for full season...
Signed as a free agent by Seattle on 2/4/2018 to a 2-year deal worth $15,000,000 per year...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/21/2018, off Rodney Hammes (CHI)...
Earned first career win on 4/21/2018...
1/31/2021: Gets a new one-year contract worth $550,000 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 4/21/2021 with a Torn Bicep Muscle, out for 7-8 weeks...
1/31/2022: Gets a new one-year contract worth $550,000 through salary arbitration...
